mapper.update: update sys_data_option set table_name = #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, field_name = #{fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where table_code = #{tableCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and field_code = #{fieldCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select table_code, field_code, table_name, field_name, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from sys_data_option
select table_code, field_code, table_name, field_name from sys_data_option where 1=1
